message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $180 is a bit out of my price range.  I'm interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $100 for it at this time.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I've got to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $160 for the product. How about we compromise at $165?
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $165 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $120, but that's my absolute limit.

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $155? It's a bit higher than your last offer, but I'm willing to compromise.
